info.name: Performance Graphs API
info.description: Collection of APIs for Performance Graph visualizations including Performance Challenge Graph, Performance Graph, and Exercise Completed Graph.

item.name: Performance Challenge Graph

header.description: JWT authentication token for the logged-in user
JWT authentication token for the logged-in user

query.description: Type of data to retrieve. Options: 'categories' (list all challenge categories with colors), 'packs' (get packs for a category), 'challenges' (get challenges in a pack), 'data' (get graph data for a specific challenge), 'my-challenges' (get user's enrolled challenges), 'overview' (get overview stats for all categories)
Required when type='packs' or type='challenges'. The ID of the challenge category (Strength, Power, Speed, or Endurance). Get this ID from the 'Get All IDs' endpoint.
Required when type='challenges'. The ID of the challenge pack within a category. Get this ID from the 'Get All IDs' endpoint.
Required when type='data'. The ID of the specific challenge to get graph data for. Get this ID from the 'Get All IDs' endpoint.
Time filter for graph data. Options: '7D' (last 7 days), '30D' (last 30 days), '90D' (last 90 days), 'all' (all time). Default: 'all'

request.description:
Unified API for Performance Challenge Graph visualization.

**Flow:**
1. First call with `type=categories` to get all 4 categories (Strength, Power, Speed, Endurance)
2. Then call with `type=packs&categoryId=xxx` to get packs in selected category
3. Then call with `type=challenges&categoryId=xxx&packId=xxx` to get challenges in selected pack
4. Finally call with `type=data&challengeId=xxx&timeFilter=xxx` to get graph data

**Alternative flows:**
- Use `type=my-challenges` to get all challenges the user has enrolled in
- Use `type=overview` to get progress overview for all categories

**Category Colors:**
- Strength: #FF0000 (Red)
- Power: #FFA500 (Orange)
- Speed: #0000FF (Blue)
- Endurance: #00FF00 (Green)

**Graph Data Response:**
- `graphData`: Array of data points with date, result, and target
- `direction`: 'up' (higher is better) or 'down' (lower is better)
- `currentLevel`: User's current performance level
- `unit`: Unit of measurement for the challenge

item.description: APIs for Performance Challenge Graph visualization - shows athlete progress in performance challenges across Strength, Power, Speed, and Endurance categories.

item.name: Performance Graph

header.description: JWT authentication token for the logged-in user
JWT authentication token for the logged-in user

query.description: Type of data to retrieve. Options: 'categories' (list all exercise categories with colors and totals), 'exercises' (get exercises for a category with PB indicators), 'data' (get graph data for a specific exercise)
Required when type='exercises'. The ID of the challenge category (Strength, Power, Speed, or Endurance). Get this ID from the 'Get All IDs' endpoint.
Required when type='data'. The ID of the specific exercise to get performance graph data for. Get this ID from the 'Get All IDs' endpoint.
Time filter for graph data. Options: '7D' (last 7 days), '30D' (last 30 days), '90D' (last 90 days), 'all' (all time). Default: 'all'

request.description:
Unified API for Performance Graph visualization from Physical Performance tab.

**Flow:**
1. First call with `type=categories` to get all 4 categories with total logged counts
2. Then call with `type=exercises&categoryId=xxx` to get exercises in selected category (shows PB indicators)
3. Finally call with `type=data&exerciseId=xxx&timeFilter=xxx` to get performance graph data

**Category Colors:**
- Strength: #FF0000 (Red)
- Power: #FFA500 (Orange)
- Speed: #0000FF (Blue)
- Endurance: #00FF00 (Green)

**Categories Response includes:**
- `totalLogged`: Total number of times exercises in this category have been logged

**Exercises Response includes:**
- `isPB`: Boolean indicating if this exercise has a Personal Best
- `pbValue`: The Personal Best value (if exists)
- `pbUnit`: Unit for the PB value
- `totalSets`: Total sets logged for this exercise
- `totalReps`: Total reps logged for this exercise

**Graph Data Response:**
- `graphData`: Array of data points with date, value, and isPB marker
- `personalBest`: Object with value, date, and unit of the all-time PB
- `totalSets`: Total sets logged in the time period
- `totalReps`: Total reps logged in the time period
- `unit`: Unit of measurement for the exercise

item.description: APIs for Performance Graph visualization - shows exercise performance over time from Physical Performance tab with PB markers and totals.

header.description: JWT authentication token for the logged-in user

query.description: View type for the graph. Options: 'weekly' (shows Mon-Sun bars for the week), 'monthly' (shows Jan-Dec bars for the year). Default: 'weekly'
Used when view='weekly'. The date to determine which week to show (format: YYYY-MM-DD). Shows the week containing this date. Default: current date
Used when view='monthly'. The year to show monthly data for (format: YYYY). Default: current year
Optional. User ID to get data for. If not provided, uses the authenticated user's ID. Useful for coaches viewing athlete data

request.description:
API for Exercise Completed Graph - a vertical bar chart showing total sets logged.

**Weekly View:**
- Shows 7 bars for Monday through Sunday
- Each bar represents total sets logged on that day
- Tooltip shows breakdown by category (Strength, Power, Speed, Endurance)
- Use `date` parameter to navigate between weeks

**Monthly View:**
- Shows 12 bars for January through December
- Each bar represents total sets logged in that month
- Tooltip shows breakdown by category
- Use `year` parameter to navigate between years

**Response Structure:**
- `view`: 'weekly' or 'monthly'
- `period`: Object describing the time period (week range or year)
- `data`: Array of bar data with:
  - `label`: Day name (Mon-Sun) or month name (Jan-Dec)
  - `date`/`month`: The specific date or month number
  - `totalSets`: Total sets for that period
  - `categories`: Object with set counts per category (strength, power, speed, endurance)
- `summary`: Object with:
  - `totalSets`: Grand total sets in the period
  - `categoryTotals`: Breakdown by category
  - `averagePerDay`/`averagePerMonth`: Average sets

**Category Colors for Tooltip:**
- Strength: #FF0000 (Red)
- Power: #FFA500 (Orange)
- Speed: #0000FF (Blue)
- Endurance: #00FF00 (Green)

variable.description: Base URL for the API server
JWT authentication token obtained after login
